Package helpers

Class InputValidators

  • java.lang.Object
    • helpers.InputValidators
  • public abstract class InputValidators
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class with static methods to organize input validation functions

        public static boolean validateAppointmentStartIsBeforeEnd​(Appointment appointment)
        Validates whether an appointment's start time is before its end time
        Parameters:
        appointment - Appointment object to check
        Returns:
        boolean status of validation

      • validateAppointmentOverlap

        public static boolean validateAppointmentOverlap​(Appointment appointment)
        Validates whether an appointment overlaps with an existing appointment for the same customer. Appointment supplied is compared against all existing appointments from customer. Immediately returns true if appointment being checked has the same ID as an existing appointment for customer to guard against false positives. Lambda method is used to allow for clean application of a predicate with Stream API.
        Parameters:
        appointment - Appointment object to validate
        Returns:
        boolean validation status

      • validateAppointmentTime

        public static boolean validateAppointmentTime​(Appointment appointment)
        Validates whether the appointment supplied has as start or end time outside of business hours.
        Parameters:
        appointment - Appointment object to validate
        Returns:
        boolean validation status
